sub_title: Freelance Translator German, English, Dutch available for assignments
summary:
You are the owner of a company, and you want to sell your products abroad or buy goods in Geman- or Dutch-speaking countries. Or you want to have your website translated into German or Dutch.
You are a Christian Publisher in search of a Christian translator who conveys the message of your books exactly from German or Dutch into English - or the other way round.
You work for a church or Christian organization, and you want to translate your texts or build contacts in German- or Dutch-speaking countries.
You are looking for someone who can put subtitles under your film or video.

Together we can find out what it is you really need:
A fast and correct translation of your short text?
A precise translation of your book for a reasonable price?
A letter in German or Dutch?
Or correction of your own translation?

I studied at the IDI-Dolmetscherinstitut (language institute) in Stuttgart, Germany, and have a diploma in international correspondence and trade.
Since then I have gained many years of experience in interpreting and translating for churches, Christian organizations, and foundations.
But... my interests and skills are not limited to Faith alone. I am equally happy to translate texts on other subjects. My experience ranges from business letters, CVs, contracts and publicity matter to articles on creativity, drawing/painting, environment, economy and health issues.
Through personal contact with you or your author, I make sure that your message is understood and put across correctly to the readers of the other language! 

Check out my business page - From Word to Word Translations - to see how you can get in touch with me and how to ask for an offer!
